languages.text: "Воровство священных таинств и секретов Адептус Механикус — зафиксировано. Подстрекание благословенного техножреца к ереси — зафиксировано. Кощунственное смешение священных технологий с нечестивыми — зафиксировано. Дальнейшая фиксация прегрешений — прекращена". {n}Бур на мехадендрите яростно взвизгивает.{/n}

"Theft of sacraments and secrets of the Adeptus Mechanicus: registered. Inciting a devout Tech-Priest to commit heresy: registered. Blasphemous merging of sacred technologies with forbidden ones: registered. Further transgression registration discontinued." {n}The drill on Pasqal's mechadendrite screeches in fury.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Воровство священных таинств и секретов Адептус Механикус — зафиксировано. Подстрекание благословенного техножреца к ереси — зафиксировано. Кощунственное смешение священных технологий с нечестивыми — зафиксировано. Дальнейшая фиксация прегрешений — прекращена". {n}Бур на мехадендрите яростно взвизгивает.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "The stealing of the sacred sacraments and secrets of Adeptus Mechanicus — check. Pushing the blessed Tech-Priest to heresy — check. The blasphemous merging of the sacred technologies with the lowly ones — check. The further recording of the offences — finished." {n}The drill on the mechadendrite screeches angrily.{/n}

"The stealing of the sacred sacraments and secrets of Adeptus Mechanicus — check. Pushing the blessed Tech-Priest to heresy — check. The blasphemous merging of the sacred technologies with the lowly ones — check. The further recording of the offences — finished." {n}The drill on the mechadendrite screeches angrily.{/n}

"The stealing of the sacred sacraments and secrets of Adeptus Mechanicus, check. Pushing the blessed Tech-Priest to heresy, check. The blasphemous merging of the sacred technologies with the lowly ones, check. The further recording of the offences, discontinued." {n}The drill on the mechadendrite screeches angrily.{/n}

"The stealing of the sacred sacraments and secrets of Adeptus Mechanicus, check. Pushing the blessed Tech-Priest to heresy, check. The blasphemous merging of the sacred technologies with the lowly ones, check. The further recording of the offences, discontinued." {n}The drill on the mechadendrite screeches angrily.{/n}

"Theft of sacraments and secrets of the Adeptus Mechanicus: registered. Inciting a blessed Tech-Priest to commit heresy: registered. Blasphemous merging of sacred technologies with impure creations: registered. Further transgression registration discontinued." {n}The drill on Pasqal's mechadendrite screeches in fury.{/n}

"Theft of sacraments and secrets of the Adeptus Mechanicus: registered. Inciting a devout Tech-Priest to commit heresy: registered. Blasphemous merging of sacred technologies with forbidden ones: registered. Further transgression registration discontinued." {n}The drill on Pasqal's mechadendrite screeches in fury.{/n}

languages.text: « Enregistrement des crimes suivants : vol des saints sacrements et des secrets de l'Adeptus Mechanicus, agissements ayant incité un technoprêtre à l'hérésie, association blasphématoire de technologies sacrées et primitives. Les autres transgressions seront consignées ultérieurement. » {n}La foreuse de la mécadendrite de Pasqal grince de colère.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Theft of sacraments and secrets of the Adeptus Mechanicus: registered. Inciting a devout Tech-Priest to commit heresy: registered. Blasphemous merging of sacred technologies with forbidden ones: registered. Further transgression registration discontinued." {n}The drill on Pasqal's mechadendrite screeches in fury.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Enregistrement des crimes suivants : vol des saints sacrements et des secrets de l'Adeptus Mechanicus, agissements ayant incité un technoprêtre à l'hérésie, association blasphématoire de technologies sacrées et primitives. Les autres transgressions seront consignées ultérieurement. » {n}La foreuse de la mécadendrite de Pasqal grince de colère.{/n}

languages.text: «Hurto de sacramentos y secretos del Adeptus Mechanicus: registrado. Incitación a la herejía a un tecnosacerdote devoto: registrado. Fusión blasfema de tecnologías sagradas y prohibidas: registrada. Registro de transgresiones adicionales cancelado». {n}El taladro de la mecadendrita de Pasqal chirría con furia.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Theft of sacraments and secrets of the Adeptus Mechanicus: registered. Inciting a devout Tech-Priest to commit heresy: registered. Blasphemous merging of sacred technologies with forbidden ones: registered. Further transgression registration discontinued." {n}The drill on Pasqal's mechadendrite screeches in fury.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Hurto de sacramentos y secretos sagrados del Adeptus Mechanicus confirmado. Incitación a la herejía de un tecnosacerdote bendito confirmada. Fusión blasfema de tecnologías sacras con otras impuras confirmada. Catalogación de los demás delitos innecesaria». {n}El taladro de su mecadendrita chilla con furia.{/n}

languages.text: “窃取机械修会神圣的礼物与秘密，罪行确认。煽动虔诚的技术神甫走向异端道路，罪行确认。将神圣的技术与低劣的亵渎技术进行融合，罪行确认。本单位停止继续记录其他罪行。”{n}帕斯卡机械触须的钻头发出了愤怒的尖叫声。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Theft of sacraments and secrets of the Adeptus Mechanicus: registered. Inciting a devout Tech-Priest to commit heresy: registered. Blasphemous merging of sacred technologies with forbidden ones: registered. Further transgression registration discontinued." {n}The drill on Pasqal's mechadendrite screeches in fury.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “窃取机械修会神圣的礼物与秘密，罪行确认。将受祝福的技术祭司推向异端道路，罪行确认。将神圣的技术与低劣的亵渎技术进行融合，罪行确认。本单位停止继续记录其他罪行。”{n}机械触须的钻头上发出了愤怒的尖叫声。{/n}

languages.text: "Diebstahl von Sakramenten und Geheimnissen des Adeptus Mechanicus: registriert. Verleitung eines frommen Techpriesters, Ketzerei zu begehen: registriert. Blasphemistische Verschmelzung heiliger Technologien mit verbotenen Technologien: registriert. Registrierung weiterer Vergehen abgebrochen." {n}Der Bohrer an Pasqals Mechadendrit kreischt zornig auf.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Theft of sacraments and secrets of the Adeptus Mechanicus: registered. Inciting a devout Tech-Priest to commit heresy: registered. Blasphemous merging of sacred technologies with forbidden ones: registered. Further transgression registration discontinued." {n}The drill on Pasqal's mechadendrite screeches in fury.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Diebstahl der heiligen Sakramente und Geheimnisse des Adeptus Mechanicus, jawohl. Den gesegneten Techpriester zur Ketzerei treiben, jawohl. Die blasphemische Verschmelzung der heiligen Technologien mit den niederen Technologien, jawohl. Auf die weitere Auflistung der Vergehen wird verzichtet." {n}Der Bohrer an dem Mechadendriten kreischt wütend.{/n}

languages.text: 「ひとつ、帝国技術局の神聖な秘跡と秘密を盗んだ。ひとつ、祝福された技術司祭を異端へと追いやった。ひとつ、神聖な技術を低俗な技術に融合させるという神を冒涜する行為。これ以上の犯罪の記録は中止する」{n}パスカルの機械触手のドリルが怒りに唸っているような音を立てる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Theft of sacraments and secrets of the Adeptus Mechanicus: registered. Inciting a devout Tech-Priest to commit heresy: registered. Blasphemous merging of sacred technologies with forbidden ones: registered. Further transgression registration discontinued." {n}The drill on Pasqal's mechadendrite screeches in fury.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ひとつ、帝国技術局の神聖な秘跡と秘密を盗んだ。ひとつ、祝福された技術司祭を異端へと追いやった。ひとつ、神聖な技術を低俗な技術に融合させるという神を冒涜する行為。これ以上の犯罪の記録は中止する」{n}パスカルの機械触手のドリルが怒りに唸っているような音を立てる。{/n}

languages.text: "Adeptus Mechanicus'un kutsal varlıkları ve sırları hırsızlığı kaydedildi. Sadık bir Tekno Rahip'i kâfirliğe teşvik kaydedildi. Kutsal teknolojilerin yasak olanlarla kâfirce birleştirilmesi kaydedildi. Diğer ihlallerin kaydı durduruldu." {n}Pasqal'ın mekadentritlerindeki matkap öfkeyle cırlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Theft of sacraments and secrets of the Adeptus Mechanicus: registered. Inciting a devout Tech-Priest to commit heresy: registered. Blasphemous merging of sacred technologies with forbidden ones: registered. Further transgression registration discontinued." {n}The drill on Pasqal's mechadendrite screeches in fury.{/n}
